Name: Kim Dang
Description: I'm passionate about building programs around human-centered design. I am an aspiring weightlifting competitor and Yelp Eliter

roles.title: Chief of Technology
roles.description: Led a team of 3 in designing and launching the organization’s website with CSS and HTML. Structured and incorporated search engine optimization within the website, increasing site traffic by 300% within 2 weeks and search ranking by 200% during recruitment drive. Hosted resume building and introductory HTML/CSS workshops for the organization which resulted in 20+ students attendance.

roles.title: Communications & Project Management Intern
roles.description: Proposed a 6 week strategic plan for real estate portfolio achieving the top presentation for portfolio executives. Collaborated with upper management to make over 85,000 contact attempts and confirmed over 8,000 votes during the 2018 Primary Election for Yes on J measure, resulting in the measure being passed

Projects.Name: MELT
Projects.Description: MERN app that provides users with a way to report and see other Immigrations and Customs Enforcement (ICE) raids on a map
Projects.TechStack: Tech Stack: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB

Projects.Name: Real Estate Price Visualizer
Projects.TechStack: Tech Stack: React, CSS Modules, Node.js, Express Webpack, MongoDB, AWS EC2, Docker, Jest/Enzyme

Education.Name: University of California, Davis
Education.Description: B.A. Communications and Minor in Computer Science
